title: GDV Makes Bullish Cross Above Critical Moving Average - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Thursday, shares of Gabelli Dividend & Income Trust (Symbol: GDV) crossed above their 200 day moving average of $20.87, changing hands as high as $21.10 per share. Gabelli Dividend & Income Trust shares are currently trading up about 1.4% on the day. The chart below shows the one year performance of GDV shares, versus its 200 day moving average:
